property.name: hawq.master.port
property.description: Port number for HAWQ master and HAWQ standby

property.name: hawq.segments.per.node
property.description: Number of HAWQ segments processes per segment node

property.name: hawq.user.password
property.description: HAWQ Admin Password. If the field is left empty, Ambari will assume existing gpadmin user has been created and the Master server will have passwordless ssh to all the Segment servers.

property.name: hawq.temp.directory
property.description: Use as temporary filespace to store workfile cache, sort/join temp files etc. Allocation varies depending on disk storage available on system. E.g. /data11/tmp /data12/tmp ...

property.name: hawq.master.keytab.file
property.description: Keytab file (in HAWQ Master) generated by the Kerberos admin for HAWQ Master when secure HDFS is enabled
